mapper.select:
SELECT count(ml.id) FROM measure_list ml JOIN category_v3 cv3 ON ml.root_category_key = cv3.`key` AND cv3.delete_at IS NULL
JOIN measure_squad_user msu on msu.list_id = ml.id AND msu.project_id = #{projectId} AND msu.user_id in
#{item}
JOIN measure_zone mz on mz.list_id = ml.id AND mz.project_id = #{projectId} AND mz.category_path_and_key LIKE concat(#{categoryPathAndKey},'%')
JOIN measure_list_area mla on mla.list_id = ml.id AND mla.project_id = #{projectId} AND mla.area_path_and_id LIKE concat(#{areaPathAndId},'%')
WHERE ml.project_id = #{projectId} AND ml.delete_at IS NULL
AND ml.finish_status = #{finishStatus}
AND ml.name like concat('%',#{q},'%')
SELECT id, `name`, root_category_key FROM measure_list WHERE project_id = #{project_id} AND delete_at IS NULL

select id, `name`, project_id, area_type, close_status, finish_status, root_category_key, plan_begin_on, plan_end_on, create_at, update_at, delete_at from measure_list where project_id=#{project_id} AND delete_at IS NULL
